last_episode_to_air.name: I Are Legend
last_episode_to_air.overview: Weasel, I.R. and The Red Guy are believed to be the last beings on Earth, until they discover that everybodys been watching their show... where it turns out that Baboon is really the star!

name: I Am Weasel
overview: The adventures of the noble, generous, intelligent and good-at-everything I.M. Weasel, who must compete once again with his arch-enemy, the bumbling, brainless and utterly talentless I.R. Baboon.

episodes.name: This Bridge, Not Weasel Bridge
episodes.overview: I.R. is in charge on making a bridge from the U.S. to France, but when Weasel takes over, I.R. vows for revenge.

episodes.name: I.R. on Sun
episodes.overview: I.R. is jealous of I.M. Weasel (I.M. being the first on Mars, Jupiter and Uranus). But then NASA tells I.R. that he can become the first on the sun, and I.R. readily accepts the job. This creates quite the challenge for I.M...

episodes.name: Deep Sea Tour
episodes.overview: I.R. has his own ""Deep Sea Tour"" company, which takes people to the bottom of the sea.

episodes.name: I.R. Gentlemans
episodes.overview: It's discovered that I.R. is the king of the kingdom of Yurp, so Weasel must turn him into a gentleman.

episodes.name: I Are Big Star
episodes.overview: I.R. will do anything to get Weasel's role on his last movie.

episodes.name: Power of Odor
episodes.overview: I.R. starts his own pig farm, covering the whole town with an awful stench.

episodes.name: Ping Pong at Sea
episodes.overview: Weasel is going to face a human in a ping-pong duel. A jealous I.R. tells the human  that he's won a trip, so I.R. can duel Weasel himself. But as I.R realizes that he doesn't stand a chance, he resorts to cheating.

episodes.name: Disease Fiesta
episodes.overview: While Weasel is trying to cure an athlete's face patient, I.R. Baboon creates a cure which goes wrong and spreads it over the town.

episodes.name: I.R. Plant Life
episodes.overview: I.R. falls in love with a flower he has grown.

episodes.name: I Am Ambassador
episodes.overview: Two dudes take a group of beavers hostage and Weasel must save them.

episodes.name: Happy Baboon Holidays
episodes.overview: It's Christmas, and I.R.'s family pays a visit. But when they go to Weasel's house instead, I.R. vows to ruin Christmas.

episodes.name: Law of Gravity
episodes.overview: I.R. destroys the Law of Gravity (literally), which causes all lawyers to float (since they are the only ones that understand law).

episodes.name: I, Architect
episodes.overview: An accident causes Weasel and I.R. to drop their brains.These get swapped while being unconscious.

episodes.name: I.R. Mommy
episodes.overview:
I.R. finds an abandoned baby and adopts him as his son.

Red's role: Guy that is surprised that Supercow found him on an I.M. Weasel episode.

episodes.name: I.M Deity
episodes.overview:
Weasel and I.R. create their forms of life.

Red doesn't appear in this episode.

episodes.name: I Am Crybaby
episodes.overview:
Weasel must relocate the people who suffer from the cronic crybaby syndrome, not knowing that they are the main source of water on the planet.

Red's role: A fisherman. Also appears as I.R.'s good and bad conscience (both on-screen at the same time). At the end, he's the only character that seems to survive.

episodes.name: I.R.'s Phantom Foot
episodes.overview:
I.R. hurts himself while walking up to Weasel's house! Weasel discovers that I.R. has broken his phantom foot! When I.R. goes to see Dr Clearbottom on phantom limbs, this doc's services are at a very high price! Weasel later reveals that it was Clearbottom who dug the hole which injured I.R.'s phantom foot so he can take all his money!

Red's role:Red Clearbottom, the doctor, phantom shoe salesman and lawyer who broke I.R.'s phantom foot so he could take all his money!

episodes.name: Queen of DeNile
episodes.overview:
In ancient Egipt, Weasel and I.R. must save the queen from a huge group of snakes.

Red's role: Queen of DeNile (The Nile).

episodes.name: I Are Music Man
episodes.overview:
I.R. competes against Weasel in a music concert.

Red's role: Blind guy that sells I.R. a strange instrument.

episodes.name: I Am My Lifetime
episodes.overview:
Now retired and living in asylums, Weasel and I.R. recall the days when they were young.

Red's role: Also retired, lives in a Villians Retirement Home.

episodes.name: I.R. Pixie Fairie
episodes.overview:
The Red Guy tells us a story about a small group of Baboon Fairies and how they all work together as presidents, with I.R. Baboon as their slave.

Red's role: The Storyteller.

episodes.name: I.R. Ice Fisher
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. try some ice fishing in the artic.

episodes.name: I.R. Role Model
episodes.overview:
I Am Weasel saves a woman from a fire, but everyone thinks I.R. did it and Weasel actually started the fire.

Red's role: Woman that actually starts the fire. (We also see three little Reddies! LOL!)

episodes.name: I.R. in Wrong Cartoon
episodes.overview:
Cow selfishly wants Weasel for herself so she fishes him out of the tv with a pie! But I.R. becomes very lonely without Weasel.

Red's Role:Bearskinned rig who tells Cow how to get Weasel out of the tv and also the star of I.B. Red Guy.

episodes.name: My Friend, the Smart Banana
episodes.overview:
While working on a supermarket, Weasel meets a smart banana with the ability of speaking.

Red's role: Supermarket Manager (he isn't shown we just hear his voice though the loudspeakers).

episodes.name: I.R. Wild Baboon
episodes.overview:
Weasel investigates the strange habits of I.R., who keeps changing his habitat due to unknown reasons.

Red's role: A reporter that interviews Weasel in jail. There's also a red guy fishing in the water. Also he has another role at the end, but it will spoil the hilarous end gag of this cartoon.

episodes.name: Time Weasel
episodes.overview:
Weasel creates a time machine that I.R. uses to go back in time, but Weasel discovers that I.R. is destined to solve all kind of problems at certain periods.

Red's role: Waiter that serves onion rings in a peculiar way.

episodes.name: The Hole
episodes.overview:
Weasel comes to investigate the world's largest hole, same hole I.R. tries to fill with cement.

Red doesn't appear in this episode.

episodes.name: I Stand Corrected
episodes.overview:
Weasel and I.R. are sent to a correctional institute were everyone is forced to wear stupid corrective devices.

Red's role: I.R.'s lawyer and the warden of the correctional institute.

episodes.name: I Am Bush Pilot
episodes.overview:
Weasel is the captain of his own comercial plane, and must take a bunch of people up a river with I.R. as his co-pilot.

Red's role: Stewardess... oh, all right, flight attendant.

episodes.name: Dessert Island
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. end up stranded on an island made entirely of confectionaries. Flem and Earl make cameo appearances at the end of this episode.

episodes.name: I Am Vampire
episodes.overview:
I.R. is captain of his own ship, until it bumps an iceberg and it starts sinking.

Red's role: A Sailor in I.R.'s ship.

episodes.name: Honey I Are Home
episodes.overview:
Weasel and Baboon are a pair of friendly vampires who drink only canned blood and are just looking for a fun little night on the town in Pantsylvania. But someone should try telling that to the vampire hunter Dr. von Smellstein, who's out to get our heroes!

Red's role: Dr. Von Smellstein.

episodes.name: Unsinkable I.R.
episodes.overview:
I.R. is jealous of his neighbor Weasel because he has a better wife, kids job and house than him.

Red's role: A woman who says that she's I.R's wife.

episodes.name: A Tree Story
episodes.overview:
I.R. takes a driving test and Weasel is his teacher! I.R. drives through the city ""Miami Vice""-style and wrecks it in progress therefore failing the test! But Weasel later finds out that I.R. was coming to get a poetic license since he made a lot of rhymes during the driving test!

Red doesn't appear in this episode.

episodes.name: Driver's Sped
episodes.overview:
The trees decide to rebel against humans after I.R. chops one.

Red doesn't appear in this episode.

episodes.name: I.R. Do
episodes.overview:
I.R. is getting married with a hyena, but it happens that she ran away with a German, hairless chihuahua.

Red's role: A guest at I.R.'s wedding.

episodes.name: I Are Good Dog
episodes.overview: A kid adopts Weasel and I.R. as his pet dogs.

episodes.name: He Said, He Said
episodes.overview:
Weasel tells his story to psiquiatrist Sigmund Fraud about his mishaps with I.R., at the same time I.R. is telling his own mishaps with Weasel in the room next door.

Red's role: Psiquiatrist (actually, Psicotic) Professor Sigmund Fraud.

episodes.name: Enemy Camp
episodes.overview:
Weasel and I.R. remember the days in which they were good friends, until they were send to Enemy Camp.

Red's role: Instructor at Enemy Camp.

episodes.name: I Am Clichéd
episodes.overview:
The director of Weasel and I.R.'s cartoons does nothing but stealing old clichés from classic cartoons.

Red's role: Joey B. Bare, the director. Also makes a cameo as a nurse in his own story ""The Young and the Wrestlers"".

episodes.name: I Are Gladiator
episodes.overview:
Back in Roman times, Weasel and I.R. battle each other as gladiators.

Red's role: Emperor Gluteus Maximus.

episodes.name: Revolutionary Weasel
episodes.overview:
Weasel and I.R. tell their grandsons how they influenced U.S. history.

Red's role: The King and Queen of England, plus the entire British army.

episodes.name: I.R. Ghost
episodes.overview:
Weasel and Baboon are ghosts, assigned to haunt the house of a washed-up movie starlet (played by the Red Guy). But Baboon keeps goofing up, and even Weasel is finding the starlet a hard scare.

Red's role: A female movie star who Weasel and I.R. try to scare.

episodes.name: Magnificient Motorbikini
episodes.overview:
Weasel & Baboon try out Weasel's latest invention: The Magnifi-   cient Motorbikini! But the Motorbikini doesn't have any brake(why I.R. came too late) and that results trouble, trouble... and trouble.

Red doesn't appear in this episode.

episodes.name: I Am Hairstylist
episodes.overview:
Weasel is a talented hairstylist, while Baboon has an awful job doing toes. And thing's don't look really good when Red Guy the Hair-Police tries to book'em up!

Red's role: Hair policeman(at least he gives him out for that).

episodes.name: I Am Whale Captain
episodes.overview:
Weasel the Whale Captain is looking for the giant squid.

Red's role: Appears at the end saying that his contract has been broken because he's supposed to be in every episode.

episodes.name: Dream Weasel
episodes.overview:
I am Weasel has created a machine giving dreams to the dreamless.

Red's role: Has got in Earl's brain so he can't dream.

episodes.name: The Baboon's Paw
episodes.overview: I.R. discovers that he has magical paws granting all awful wishes.

episodes.name: The Sackless Games
episodes.overview:
Weasel & Baboon join Red Guys version of Olympians: The Sackless Games!

Red's role: The creator/instructor/judger of The Sackless Games.

episodes.name: Who Rubbed Out Cow and Chicken?
episodes.overview:
Weasel and I.R. investigate the crime of who is erasing the characters from Cow & Chicken.

Red's role: A Janitor, who has pants drawn on him. It turns out he's the guilty.

episodes.name: I Are Good Salesman
episodes.overview:
Baboon's selling wild fire door-to-door, and Weasel must stop him!

Red's role: Joins IR. selling water the persons right after IR. has sold them fire.

episodes.name: I Are Terraformer
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. travel to the Moon to create a new form of living, through oxygen, cities and plants.

episodes.name: I Am Viking
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. are Vikings, who are ready, willing and able to pillage and plunder anything in sight. However, is it not too late to join The Red Guy in being a Viking cheerleader?

episodes.name: Drinking Fountain of Youth
episodes.overview: In a Christopher Columbus-like story, Weasel and I.R. set sail to find the Drinking Fountain of Youth.

episodes.name: Leave it to Weasel
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. are called in as replacement kids after a couple's real children go away to camp.

episodes.name: The Fairy Godfather
episodes.overview: Based on Cinderella, Cinder-Weasel tries to make it to the evening ball, despite the interference of his evil stepbrother, I.R. Baboon. Can our Weasel get help from his Fairy Godfather (The Red Guy)?

episodes.name: I Are Robin Hood
episodes.overview: I.R. Baboon takes the role of Robin Hood, with Weasel being his ally, Little John.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Weasel
episodes.overview: Doctors Weasel and I.R. shrink themselves in order to perform an operation, which is to repair a crack in The Red Guy's butt cheek.

episodes.name: Baboon Man & Weasel Boy
episodes.overview: Based on Batman, I.R. Baboon is the hero known as Baboon Man, whereas Weasel is his sidekick, Weasel Boy.

episodes.name: I.M.N. Love
episodes.overview: Whilst at the gym, Weasel and I.R. fall in love with Cow and Chicken's Teacher.

episodes.name: I.R.'s First Bike
episodes.overview: I.R. gets a bike for Christmas. Learning of his inexperience, Weasel tries to help him.

episodes.name: The Sorcerer's a Dentist
episodes.overview: Back in the medieval times, Weasel is a dentist with wizardry powers with Baboon as his envious nurse.

episodes.name: The Wrong Bros.
episodes.overview: Based on the true story of The Wright Brothers, The Red Guy narrates a documentary about The Right Bros. and the Wrong Bros. (Weasel and I.R.), competing to see who could invent the first plane.

episodes.name: I Am Cave Weasel
episodes.overview: Weasel and Baboon are cave-men living back in the prehistoric times, while Weasel tries to invent new products to create the future.

episodes.name: My Blue Hiney
episodes.overview: A narrator tells the story about the travelling country-singing duo of Weasel and Baboon.

episodes.name: Mission: Stupid
episodes.overview: Weasel and Baboon are troops enlisted in the U.S Ground Force and must rescue a lone kitty stuck in a tree.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. are sent back to repeat the 4th Grade, in which they would go to the same school as Cow and Chicken.

episodes.name: I Are a Artiste
episodes.overview: The Red Guy narrates the story of when Weasel and Baboon moved to Paris in 1909 to become famous artists.

episodes.name: Fred: Last of the Idiots
episodes.overview: Weasel and Baboon are on an expedition to capture a wild, dim-witted savage named Fred. When they manage to capture him, Weasel, however, cannot understand his unusual language.

episodes.name: I Are Bellhop
episodes.overview: Weasel works at a hotel as the manager, whereas I.R. is his incompetent bellhop. However, Weasel needs to rely on I.R's help when an acclaimed cannibal actor (The Red Guy) wants to eat him for dinner.

episodes.name: Take I.R. Out to the Ballgame
episodes.overview: IR and Weasel go to a baseball game and Weasel wants to watch all of it, but IR will make sure that that doesn't happen.

episodes.name: I Am Bee Weasel
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. are worker bees, and our red-butt baboon wants to do a honey dance like all the other bees, but it soon results in further problems.

episodes.name: I Am Franken-Weasel
episodes.overview: Based on the story of Frankenstein, Weasel is a mad scientist, whereas I.R. is his assistant.

episodes.name: A Troo Storee
episodes.overview: Weasel's theory on monkeys typing Shakespeare goes wrong when almost every monkey involved walks out on him. However, he sees hope in the form of I.R. Baboon, who writes a book entitled "A Troo Storee," despite the fact that it lowers peoples' I.Q. level.

episodes.name: Rodeo Weasel
episodes.overview: Weasel is famous cowboy working in a rodeo in which Baboon is a clown. Cow and Chicken's teacher and her husband appear in this episode.

episodes.name: The Legend of Big Butt
episodes.overview: Weasel and I.R. are in search of a legend known as Big Butt, which later happens to be The Red Guy.

episodes.name: I Am Dragon Slayer
episodes.overview: It's the Middle Ages, and Weasel and I.R. are looking for a dragon to slay.

episodes.name: I Are Legend
episodes.overview: Weasel, I.R. and The Red Guy are believed to be the last beings on Earth, until they discover that everybodys been watching their show... where it turns out that Baboon is really the star!
